name: The Solvandus
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a demo version of the game, therefore it might have some bugs here and there. I hope it’s not too frustrating! We’ll update its soon!

THE SOLVANDUS is a 2D Platformer Game, Just a simple Action - Adventure game in the Unity. This demo is meant to specifically highlight TheSolvandus gameplay system and is based on an unfinished version of the game. Many assets are unfinished and the content of the demo may not be representative of the final game. Note, this was a hastily slapped together demo, so do not be surprised to find bugs, glitches, or very unfinished content! This is a game using completely home-made assets. It is completely free, but a donation would be very much appreciated. I hope you download this game and other future games that I have planned.

NOTE,

- Controller recommended, but not required.

- This demo is for Windows only.

Controls:

-Use W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to Move.

-Use Spacebar to Jump.

-Use E for entering doors.

-Use ESC to Pause/Unpause. -Press left mouse to Shoot.

You can get in touch with me and give me feedback, send me love mail or hate mail here: sepianabi@gmail.com
